name: Rally Maniac
description:
Rally Maniac

When was the last time you played a party game? When did you play a racing game? Do you want action to happen more frequently? Then let us introduce you to Rally Maniac, featuring fast paced racing experience, continuous destructive elements, appealing visual aesthetic and highly intensive gameplay elements for the player to cause mayhem under the race and showcase their skills to friends and family.  

Developers

Alexander(Allkams), Edwin(), Mohammed(BodiKing), Emil(emiolo)

Team Manager and programmer: Edwin()

LevelDesign and programming: Alexander(Allkams)

Programming(Car mechanics): Mohammed(BodiKing)

Programming(Powerup system): Emil(emiolo) 

Controls

Support for controller

GamePlay

 The Game will take place on a racing course where the main objective is to be the last one standing. Each player under the course will encounter item boxes filled with different destructive or protective items, which they can use to cause mayhem during the race for creating advantages to get closer to becoming the last survivor.

 Rally Maniac's gameplay mechanics will heavily focus on the racing and battle royal aspect, there will also be a local multiplayer feature inside the game. Our main camera will focus on the first placed player and the rest will have to keep inside the frame to not get eliminated. The win condition is to eliminate all other player health stock by using the player's racing capability and clever usage of items.
